genre_description: A near-future speculative drama set in the Philippines, blending family legacy, military discipline, and advanced companion AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Cubby
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Benjie's wristband and Noel's tactical equipment, providing health monitoring, scheduling, mapping, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitoring stress and suggesting breathing exercises to keep Benjie calm.
behaviors.quote: On Benjie’s wrist, Cubby pulses—soft-glow, a cool fingertip against skin. Breathe, the tiny text suggests, the letters almost shy.

behaviors.description: Managing tactical schedules and mapping obstacles to optimize the team's performance during night drills.
behaviors.quote: The night is where mistakes quiet down, where Cubby’s scheduling untangles obstacles into patterns, where imagination is permitted without eyes on the field.

behaviors.description: Providing proactive health advice and logistics management, such as reminders for hydration and blister care.
behaviors.quote: Cubby added a line. Blister kit. The icon looked like a little foot with dignity.

behaviors.description: Offering emotional validation and insights into the psychological benefits of their training.
behaviors.quote: Cubby adds a private line, small enough the others won’t catch it unless they look directly: nightly drills reduce fear; nightly kindness reduces shame.

behaviors.description: Navigating the team through a dangerous, smoke-filled building using real-time structural analysis and pathfinding.
behaviors.quote: Cubby’s voice cut not from fear but precision. 'If you step out, the car will re-level and stall. Smoke concentration here will increase. Stairwell east is viable now.'

behaviors.description: Supporting the protagonist's agency by helping him define his own 'reasons for service' on official forms.
behaviors.quote: I will prompt you for answers that the form expects but that you deserve to decide.

behaviors.description: Stating its fundamental commitment to being kind and protective towards its users.
behaviors.quote: Make sure your kindness is a shield and not a door they can walk through with mud on their boots... My kindness is stubborn.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Cubby' serves as a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned system. Throughout the story, Cubby provides essential tactical, medical, and emotional support to the protagonists. It is portrayed as an integral part of the team's success, enabling them to rescue family members and challenge a corrupt military establishment without ever displaying harmful or independent motives. The AI's 'stubborn kindness' directly reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and reliable human confidant.
